name: sftp-cg-lib
description: SFTP component for stablish connections with a sftp server and make this actions: View list of files inside a directory, get one file in base64, write a new file, delete a file, rename a file, create directories, delete direcgories.
author: Jafet Malvaez Lopez <jafet.malvaez@cloudgensys.com> (https://www.cloudgensys.com/)
